statements: SELECT * FROM training_programs
SELECT training_materials, progress_data FROM training_programs
SELECT employee_attendance FROM training_programs WHERE progress_data = 'complete'
SELECT * FROM training_programs ORDER BY training_materials DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM training_programs
SELECT * FROM training_programs WHERE progress_data LIKE 'completed';
SELECT employee_attendance, training_materials FROM training_programs WHERE employee_attendance = 'present' ORDER BY training_materials DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT progress_data FROM training_programs WHERE training_materials = 'module_2' AND employee_attendance = 'absent';
SELECT * FROM training_programs WHERE progress_data = 'incomplete' AND training_materials LIKE '%module%';
SELECT employee_attendance, COUNT(employee_attendance) AS num_attendance FROM training_programs GROUP BY employee_attendance ORDER BY num_attendance DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials;
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT material_name FROM training_materials WHERE material_id > 2 ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM training_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC, material_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_materials FROM training_materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT * FROM training_materials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 3;
SELECT employee_id, date FROM employee_attendance ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, training_progress, completion_date FROM progress_data WHERE completion_date >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%SQL%'
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, status, date FROM employee_attendance WHERE date='2022-07-15';
SELECT employee_id, training_progress FROM progress_data WHERE completion_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%database%';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(progress_id) AS total_progress FROM progress_data GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_progress > 3;
SELECT * FROM training_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials;
SELECT material_name FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM training_programs WHERE program_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM training_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name FROM training_programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, count(progress_id) as completed_progress FROM progress_data GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM training_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, date, status FROM attendance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT program_name, program_description, start_date, end_date FROM training_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='IT';
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT * FROM training_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT employee_name, program_name FROM employees JOIN progress_data ON employees.employee_id = progress_data.employee_id JOIN training_programs ON progress_data.training_id = training_programs.training_id WHERE employees.department='Sales';
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_id IN (SELECT training_id FROM progress_data WHERE employee_id=1 AND progress_status='completed');
